title: Noam Chomsky: Life, Information, Language, Intelligence - LIVE
description:
Legendary scholar, writer, and voice of conscience Noam Chomsky to speak on how new technologies are recasting grand philosophical questions. What is life? What is intelligence? Are we alone? Can machines think? In conversation with Oceanit’s Chief Philosophy Officer and Director of AI, Jeffrey Watamull.

Sponsors: Hawai’i Book and Music Festival, Scholars Strategy Network
